attributes.action: Ban the 2p/ltr tax on fuel due in April 2008, and REDUCE FUEL TAX overall, to be inline with Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the imposed and rapidly impending increase of fuel duty due in April by some 2p/ltr, THAT IS ABOUT 6 WEEKS TIME, I feel it is time NOW for ALL of us to act, why are we as BRITS happy to sit back and allow this to happen, It is our hard earned MONEY that is being STOLEN from us by our GOVERNMENT, Police call it TWOC...Taken With Out Consent, and if we continue to sit back and do NOTHING they will continue to do it, You try and steel and see what happens....! 

WE NEED TO STAND UP FOR OURSELVES, because our Government DONT CARE for us......

This IS Rip Off Britain, 

Welcome to TAXLAND..........

VOTE NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
